mapper.select: select t.tag_name, count(ct.tag_id) as tag_id from tag t, (select ct.tag_id as tag_id from card_tag ct, (select c.card_id as card_id from card c, (select cardlist_id from cardlist where mem_id = #{mem_id} and cardlist_instock = false) cl where c.cardlist_id = cl.cardlist_id and c.card_secret = false) c where c.card_id = ct.card_id) ct where ct.tag_id = t.tag_id group by t.tag_id
